lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The company said its merger agreement with Piedmont provides that the offer is not to be amended without Piedmont's prior written consent in any way that would be adverse to Piedmont shareholders, but it said it could cut the number of shares to be bought without Piedmont's consent.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Transportation Department on Friday rejected TWA's application to acquire USAir on the grounds that the application failed to comply with department regulations by omitting necessary information.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The offer and withdrawal rights are to expire April Three unless extended, and the bid is to be followed by a merger at the same price.

lst.name: sentence

lst.name: sentence
